about_the_game:
This is a visual novel that tells a comedic story about a campus hero, and it also includes some puzzle mini-games. We hope this work will bring smiles to everyone while also raising awareness about the importance of standing up against school bullying.

The story follows Lu Yunjie, a middle school student who accidentally witnesses his classmate Ling Yu being bullied. He decisively steps in to help. Although Ling Yu escapes, Lu Yunjie becomes a target of the bullying group. In a critical moment when he is caught, by a stroke of luck, he unintentionally gains a special superpower. With this newfound ability, Lu Yunjie embarks on a journey to fight against school bullying...

This game is a GalGame that I and my two high school friends challenged ourselves to create within one month.

The game development process and records can be viewed on the following platforms:

Bilibili:我是白林邱
Douyin:我系白林邱

Thank you all very much for your support!

name: The Losers Team
short_description: Lu Yunjie, a junior high school student, annoyed the school bully group by accident. But he also got a powerful superpower unintentionally. With this power, he challenged the bullies, triggering a series of funny events
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English, Russian, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
